CustomField.description: The coordinate of the bottom of the kanban. This is usually not used, as "top" and "left" are used by the interface to position the cards.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The coordinate of the bottom of the kanban. This is usually not used, as "top" and "left" are used by the interface to position the cards. Zero is a good default value here.
CustomField.label: Bottom
